statements: SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, count(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE estimated_delivery IS NULL ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, estimated_delivery FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY estimated_delivery DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status='DELIVERED';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_status FROM orders ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE delivery_estimate > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, delivery_estimate FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY delivery_estimate DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 202;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE delivery_estimate > '2022-01-01' AND delivery_estimate < '2022-03-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) as total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, delivery_time_estimate FROM delivery_estimates WHERE estimate_id > 500;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 456 AND quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_estimates WHERE delivery_time_estimate < 3 ORDER BY delivery_time_estimate ASC;
SELECT co.order_id, oi.item_name, oi.quantity, oi.price FROM customer_orders co JOIN order_items oi ON co.order_id = oi.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT item_id, order_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT order_id, status_date, current_status FROM delivery_status WHERE current_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM delivery_estimates WHERE estimated_delivery_date < actual_delivery_date ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT order_id, status_date, current_status FROM delivery_status ORDER BY status_date;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM delivery_estimates WHERE order_id = 201 AND actual_delivery_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, status, estimated_delivery_date FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 5000;

SELECT customer_name, status FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN order_status ON orders.order_id = order_status.order_id WHERE status = 'Shipped';
